the local church still continued to preach its brand of mythology .
it seemed that the 1 % did well here | everyone else did not .
output.sentences: Parts of the downtown are slowly decaying.
People are petitioning to get it fixed up.
The petitioners walked around to get people to sign the petition.
They attended a presentation to get more information on the subject.
Then they finished the day by having ice cream.
